headline: Show HN: Language aware diff on GitHub PRs
description:
Hi HN! We were frustrated with text diffs on GitHub PRs, so we made DiffLens (https://github.com/marketplace/difflens). DiffLens constructs an Abstract Syntax Tree for each file, and uses that semantic information to intelligently diff changes. Checkout the demo on our website (https://www.difflens.com).

Getting started with DiffLens is easy! Simply install the app on your repositories. The next time you open a PR, DiffLens will automatically create a diff for your changes. If you review code, especially TypeScript, JavaScript or CSS, give DiffLens a try!

We're always looking for feedback. If you encounter bugs, or want to give us feedback, we'll be around. You can also reach us at support@difflens.com.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 在GitHub PR上的语言意识差异
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 在GitHub PR上的語言意識差異
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，HN! 我们对GitHub PRs上的文本差异感到沮丧，所以我们做了DiffLens（https://github.com/marketplace/difflens）。DiffLens constructs an Abstract Syntax Tree for each file, and uses that semantic information to intelligently diff changes. Checkout the demo on our website (https://www.difflens.com).

Getting started with DiffLens is easy! Simply install the app on your repositories. 下次你打开一个PR时，DiffLens会自动为你的修改创建一个差异。如果你审查代码，特别是TypeScript、JavaScript或CSS，请尝试使用DiffLens！

我们一直在寻找反馈。如果你遇到了bug，或者想给我们反馈，我们会在附近。你也可以通过 support@difflens.com 联系我们。
description_zh-Hant:
嗨，HN! 我們對GitHub PRs上的文本差異感到沮喪，所以我們做了DiffLens（https://github.com/marketplace/difflens）。DiffLens constructs an Abstract Syntax Tree for each file, and uses that semantic information to intelligently diff changes. Checkout the demo on our website (https://www.difflens.com).

Getting started with DiffLens is easy! Simply install the app on your repositories. 下次你打開一個PR時，DiffLens會自動為你的修改創建一個差異。如果你審查代碼，特別是TypeScript、JavaScript或CSS，請嘗試使用DiffLens！

我們一直在尋找反饋。如果你遇到了bug，或者想給我們反饋，我們會在附近。你也可以通過 support@difflens.com 聯繫我們。
